skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: Demonstrated expertise in frontend technologies like React.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, complemented by practical experience in designing responsive user interfaces

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: hands-on experience in building robust applications using Java, Spring Boot, and Hibernate. Proficient in developing RESTful APIs and implementing secure user authentication with Spring Security

portfolio.title: Food Ordering Website
portfolio.description: This platform connects restaurant owners with food enthusiasts, enabling easy meal ordering. Key features include multi-vendor support, tailored admin panels, secure role-based access, and Stripe integration for payment processing. The frontend is designed for a user-friendly experience, with responsive design and dynamic content updates.

portfolio.title: StayFinder-Hotel Booking Website
portfolio.description: Developed a comprehensive hotel booking system that provides users with a seamless interface to search, view, and book hotels. The application features a modular backend with RESTful APIs and a responsive frontend that dynamically displays real-time data on room availability and bookings
